title: How is social dominance related to our short-term memory? An EEG/ERP investigation of encoding and retrieval during a working memory task
content:
Publication date: 15 September 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 17

Author(s): Hadi Mohamadpour, Farhad Farkhondeh Tale Navi, Soomaayeh Heysieattalab, Metehan Irak, Abdol-Hossein Vahabie, Behzad Nikzad
